articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Latest football news & transfer gossip
articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday's Champions League and EFL football, breaking news, transfer gossip, debate, plus the best of social media.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Antonio Conte: Chelsea boss wants Blues to 'find the hunger' after loss to Roma
articles.description: Chelsea must rediscover their "hunger" after a 3-0 Champions League defeat by Roma, says manager Antonio Conte.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Ashes 2017: England players have 'sensible rules' on drinking - Trevor Bayliss
articles.description: England players have agreed "sensible" rules for drinking on the Ashes tour but there will be no curfews, says coach Trevor Bayliss.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Super League fixtures 2018: Leeds Rhinos start at Warrington Wolves
articles.description: Champions Leeds Rhinos will start the defence of their Super League title at Warrington Wolves on 1 February, 2018.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Harry Kane: Is the Tottenham striker a Real Madrid Galactico in the making?
articles.description: Harry Kane's rise from a "chubby" teenager to England star was predicted by few. Could he eventually become a Real Madrid Galatico?

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: 100 days to Pyeongchang 2018: GB skier Lloyd Wallace back in Winter Olympic training two months after coma
articles.description: Lloyd Wallace says not remembering the crash that put him in a coma means he is not petrified of jumping again as he tries to qualify for the 2018 Winter Olympics.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Man Utd v Benfica: Jose Mourinho says 'no drama' over choice of penalty taker
articles.description: Man Utd boss Jose Mourinho says he cannot understand the "drama" over his decision to stop Romelu Lukaku from taking a penalty.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Baroness Grey-Thompson says Para-athletes told not to speak out about classification
articles.description: British athletes were threatened with not being selected if they spoke out about classification concerns in Paralympic sports, MPs are told.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Scott Williams back after Wales' Tyler Morgan blow
articles.description: Scarlets centre Scott Williams is recalled by Wales for their autumn Tests as Tyler Morgan drops out because of injury.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Celtic: We're improving at highest level - Brendan Rodgers
articles.description: Manager Brendan Rodgers says Celtic's display in a narrow Champions League defeat to Bayern Munich shows they are developing.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Five friends killed in New York attack
articles.description: The group from Argentina was among eight killed by a truck driven along a Manhattan cycle path.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: How the New York terror attack unfolded
articles.description: At least eight people died and multiple others were injured when a suspect drove a truck into cyclists.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Footage shows New York attack suspect
articles.description: The truck driver ploughed into cyclists before hitting a school bus and shooting with an imitation gun.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Australia to ban Uluru climb from 2019
articles.description: Visitors will not be allowed to scale the iconic monolith because of indigenous sensitivities.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Spain court summons sacked Catalan leader
articles.description: Carles Puigdemont and 13 former colleagues are summoned to appear in a Madrid court this week.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: The woman who wants Putin's job
articles.description: Ksenia Sobchak says she's running to be Russia's president next year. But who is she?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Netflix halts House of Cards production
articles.description: The show, which already said it would end after its sixth season, is now suspending all production.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US nurse gets $500,000 in blood arrest row
articles.description: Alex Wubbels was held for not allowing police to take a blood sample from an unconscious patient.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Australia Senate president to resign
articles.description: Australia's Senate president says he will resign, after confirming he is a UK dual citizen.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Tech firms questioned over 'meddling'
articles.description: Facebook, Google and Twitter lawyers tell a Senate committee they plan to be more vigilant.

articles.author: Matthew Weaver
articles.title: Damian Green denies making sexual advances towards young Tory activist
articles.description: Another Tory MP calls for Green to be suspended while claims that he touched woman’s knee and sent suggestive message are investigated

articles.author: Richard Partington
articles.title: Brexit vote has cost each household more than £600 a year, says NIESR
articles.description: Thinktank says it is ‘almost certain’ leave vote has damaged living standards as it scales back economic growth forecasts

articles.author: Larry Elliott
articles.title: Tackle UK's north-south divide with pledge on infrastructure, say experts
articles.description: Government should guarantee access to transport, schools, hospitals and digital access, says industrial strategy commission

articles.author: Angela Monaghan
articles.title: UK house prices pick up but still under pressure, says Nationwide
articles.description: Lender says shortage of homes on the market and low mortgage rates are offsetting squeeze on household incomes

articles.title: Japanese man killed and dismembered nine victims over two months – reports
articles.description: Prosecutors question Takahiro Shiraishi, who reportedly admitted cutting up bodies and throwing parts out with the rubbish

articles.title: Acid reflux drug linked to more than doubled risk of stomach cancer – study
articles.description: There are more than 50m prescriptions for proton pump inhibitors in the UK, though they have previously been linked to side-effects and increased risk of death

articles.author: Justin McCurry
articles.title: 'It's a cliche': Trump scraps visit to North Korean border
articles.description: Traditional presidential trip to tense demilitarised zone between North and South Korea is off the schedule during 12-day tour of Asia

articles.author: Stephanie Kirchgaessner, Claire Phipps, Kevin Rawlinson
articles.title: Joseph Mifsud: more questions than answers about mystery professor linked to Russia
articles.description: Court papers paint Mifsud, who has worked at universities in the UK and Italy, as a stealthy operator with deep links to the Kremlin – but he denies wrongdoing

articles.author: Helen Davidson
articles.title: Uluru climb banned from October 2019 after historic vote
articles.description: Traditional owners and park managers agree central Australian rock is ‘not a playground or theme park’ in supporting ban

articles.author: Rani Molla
articles.title: How Bozoma Saint John plans to fix Uber’s brand problem
articles.description: “Nobody is okay with this.”

articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.title: The head of the NBA wants his games to look more like Twitch
articles.description: Pro sports on TV looks the same way it looked 30 years ago, Adam Silver says. He thinks the internet can change that.

articles.author: Rani Molla
articles.title: A startup investor with billion dollar exits on how retail must change
articles.description: Kirsten Green, founder of Forerunner Ventures, breaks down the retail landscape.

articles.author: Johana Bhuiyan
articles.title: Williams-Sonoma CEO Laura Alber: ‘I do not believe Amazon is killing retailers’
articles.description: “I think retailers’ bad service is killing retailers,” Alber said.

articles.author: Recode Staff
articles.title: Full transcript: Scroll CEO Tony Haile on Recode Media
articles.description: “There’s a Moore’s law of advertising, which is that ad formats double in frustration every 18 months.”

articles.author: Eric Johnson
articles.title: Meet David Rosenblatt, the e-commerce CEO who’s not afraid of Amazon
articles.description: Rosenblatt describes his luxury marketplace company 1stdibs as “eBay meets Sotheby’s.”

articles.author: Recode Staff
articles.title: Full transcript: ‘Full Frontal’ host Samantha Bee and Turner exec Kevin Reilly onstage on Recode Media
articles.description: Diversity “has to be on your mind all the time and not in a lip service way, and then you have to fucking ... hire people who are diverse.”

articles.author: Eric Johnson
articles.title: Michael Barbaro explains why you love the New York Times’ podcast, ‘The Daily’
articles.description: “We start a story at the beginning and we get you through to the end.”
